revised_title: Torsional Vibrations in Reciprocating Engine Shafts: Analysis and Solutions
tldr: This article examines the torsional vibrations in reciprocating engine shafts and presents an analysis of the equations governing their motion. The author considers the effects of the inertia of reciprocating parts and provides solutions for the fluctuations in the engine's motion. The findings can be applied to the design and operation of engines with critical speeds to ensure safety and efficiency.
